title: Demon’s S*ave: Open the Basement Doors - Novel Updates

description: Belo's family is poor and is sold to the devil as a servant. The devil gives him a feeding task before he goes out. Every day, open one of the twelve doors in the castle basement to feed the slaves and pets inside. However, Belo does not expect that, waiting for him, is a lascivious hell.>
